name: All These Glitters Ain't No Game
name_original: All These Glitters Ain't No Game
description:
Depressed? Anxious? Having trouble falling asleep?

Check out my new game, All These Glitters, where you can stop being a player for a while, sit back, and relax.

Experience the births of universes. Let yourself drown in the symphony of time and space.

Spent a week wrapping my head around the theme 'All that glistens is not gold'. Couldn't convince myself to stick to one idea. Only when I finally decided to give up, I was struck with the phrase, "All that glitters, is not game."  😂😁

Not entirely sure that's a good idea for a 'game' jam, but nevertheless, I've done it. I have successfully taken part in my first game jam. Can't wait for the feedback.

Game Controls:

Use the up and down arrow keys to adjust the timescale. Other than that, you don't really need to do much. Just sit back, and relax.

No Victory. No Defeat. No Reward. No Punishment. Only meditation, and contemplation.
